message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but the value of this product is significant. How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
